boat.full_description: ON 689 is the Manchester & Salford lifeboat, built in 1924 by SE Saunders    IOW as a sailing lifeboat ( RNLI). She was Douglas Isle of Man,s lifeboat from 1924 to 1946 and then in relief service in many other place until 1956. She has a gaff main + Missen mast and an early Petrol engine also drop keel to enhance her sailing capability.
boat.name: Ex RNLI Manchester and Salford lifeboat ( sail)
boat.short_description: A classic GL Watson ex RNLI sailing lifeboat with Gaff main and ketch ( Mizzen) totally rebuild over 20 years to new condition.
